name: Vladimir Solovyov
description:
How Ukrainians are in fact Nazis (despite having a Jewish president, Volodymyr Zelensky), as explained by Putin's top propagandist Vladimir Solovyov: (The television host is sadly, oh so sadly, Jewish...)

During World War II, Nazis were anti-Russian. Currently, Ukrainians are anti-Russian. Therefore, Ukrainians are Nazis.

You see the logical fallacy there, don't you? Clearly, the majority of the Russian population does not. Here, let us make an analogous chain:

Oranges are fruits. Apples are fruits. Therefore, apples are oranges.

No, really, it's so easy to play along: (You'd think they teach this in Russian kindergarten, and yet...)

Circles are shapes. Squares are shapes. Therefore, squares are circles.

Want another chain?

Nazis hate Jews. Russians hate a Jew, Volodymyr Zelensky. Therefore...

It really goes without saying!
